CustomField.description: Use this field to set the flag whether to lock the transaction based on the stage. 1 indicates to be locked.
CustomField.formula: IF( ( CASE( TEXT(Stage__c), "Draft",0, "Booking",0, "Confirmation of Sale",1, "Request Registration",0, "Pending Registration",1, "Ready for Registration",1, "Car Collected",1, "Cancelled",1, 0 ))=1,TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.label: Lock
